products.title: Gleneagles Stripe Granite Curtain
products.description: Gleneagles feature several bold stripes combining darker blues and blacks with neutral creams and whites. Their granite striped gleneagles fabric features a navy blue and black blend striped paired with cream and red stripes. The striking red and cream stripes has blue thread interwoven into the colour, meaning a softer blend of colours. Product id: db-cur1107 fabric colour: granite material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes gleneagles stripe granite curtain in cream/black/red/blue/multicoloured.

products.title: Gleneagles Stripe Silver Curtain
products.description: Gleneagles feature several bold stripes combining darker blues and blacks with neutral creams and whites. Their silver striped gleneagles fabric features a grey/brown blend paired with cream and white stripes. The soft cream and white stripes has brown/grey interwoven into the colour, meaning a softer blend of colours. Product id: db-cur1106 fabric colour: silver material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes gleneagles stripe silver curtain in cream/grey/brown/multicoloured.
